law.catch_line: Minimum requirements for CASA volunteer -- Training -- Oath.

text.section: If found acceptable, then the applicant shall receive a minimum of thirty (30) hours of initial training and take an oath of confidentiality administered by a family court judge or, if none, then a District Judge.
Training, both initial and in-service, of volunteers shall be provided by the program director or staff following standards adopted pursuant to KRS 620.535.

law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 4, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990.
